STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local total = 0 local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:AddSubType( LAND_TYPE_FOREST ) filter:SetController( EffectController() ) filter:NotTargetted() total = filter:CountStopAt( 1 ) if total > 0 then local characteristics = Object():GetCurrentCharacteristics() characteristics:Power_Add( 1 ) characteristics:Toughness_Add( 1 ) end

CARD_V2.AI_CUSTOM_SCORE: local total = 0 local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:AddSubType( LAND_TYPE_FOREST ) filter:SetController( EffectController() ) filter:NotTargetted() total = filter:CountStopAt( 1 ) if total > 0 then Object():AddScore(150) end
